titles: The defence of militarie profession Wherein is eloquently shewed the due commendation of martiall prowesse, and plainly prooued how necessary the exercise of armes is for this our age.
author: Gates, Geffrey.
publisher: By Henry Middleton, for Iohn Harison,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Military art and science --  Early works to 1800.
